𒊬 ŠAR ⋍ 𒊺𒆸 ŠE.KAR #sakar 𓊖 ☑
𒊬 ŠAR ⋍ 𒊺𒆸 Š'HAR 𒄭 ḪI® 𒄯 ḪAR 𒆸 GUR •ǦUR ğor
𒊬 ŠAR ⋍ 𒊺𓈙 𒊺𓊌 shaʳ gaphically wide ☑

𒊬 šar ≈ 𒊹 šar₂ in Schar Geoʳ 𒄲 šargad world, totality

𒊬 mu2 mú 𓆷 𓈙 𓊌 marsh ⇔ 𒈬

KUR 𒊬 kiri > ŠAR SAR 𒊬 > SAL Saal : Hall

𜓘 šo 𜓗 šu šar SAR 𒊬 < car < Kar KUR 𓊖 𐊨 𐘾 𐀏 𔕇 𔕈 𐙝 𐙟 𒆠 KI® 𔕆 kar

𒊬 ŠAR scher "shave" 𓌫 ⇔
𒊬 ŠAR šakar šahar •SCAR : scribes! < graph γράφ < carve scrape सब्ज़ sabz IE *sker- ‘cut’

𒊬 šar < thér in 𒁾𒊬 dub.thér 𔕭 tùᵇ 𐀇𐁇𐀨 di-pte-ra 𒋰𒁾 διφθέρᾱ diphthérā "scribe"

𒊬 ŠAR < •GAR : guard 𒊬𒌅 𒄢𒋾 sar-tu gul-ti guarded place
𒊬 ŠAR < •GAR : garden² 𒊬𒊬 kirûm 𓈙 𓏤 𓈉, 𓋴 𓋴 𓂋 𓂧 𓇝, 𓏅𓏏 𓈙 𓏤 𓈅 ⇔ 𓋴 𓆣 𓂋 < zard
𒊬 ŠAR < •GAR : greens : vegetables zard خَضْرَاء ḵaḍrāʾ > हरा harā,
𒊬 ŠAR < •GIR 𓂻 courier chase, hasten, run

ŠAR 𒊬 /šaṭāru/ scriter > שׁוֹטֵר shotér police/guard 𒋼

𒊬𒊏𒅗𒉌 sar-ra-ka-ni = garden plot
𒊬𒊒𒄀 Šar-ru-gi Sargon of Akkad (founder)
𒊬𒊑 šar-ri shar>sultan:king (𒋗𒉡 šu-nu sein/their )
𒊬𒊏𒊍 šar-ra-as shar… : queen (𒋢𒌦 seine/their (she is))

Kings ⋍ Guardians and Gardeners!

𒁾𒊬 (dubsar, “scribe” #ṭupšarrum

𒁾𒊬 scribe ⇔ square 𒍏 𒊬 tablet ⇔
𒂍𒊬𒀀 E-sara "House of the Universe" (4-corners) ⇔ 𒆧𒆠 kish

ŠAR 𒊬 ⇔ ŠE 𒊺 𒆸 ⋍ 𒇬 LAGAR

𒆸 TUKUR LAGAB 𒆸 ⋍ 𒇬 LAGAR 𒊬 ŠAR kiri₆ •GAR garden
